# tk-toggle-button-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

TkToggleButtonGroup is a component that allows you to create a group of toggle buttons.

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                   | Type                              | Default        |
| ----------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------- | -------------- |
| `direction` | `direction` | The direction of the toggle button group.     | `"horizontal" \| "vertical"`      | `'horizontal'` |
| `rounded`   | `rounded`   | The value of the rounded toggle button group. | `boolean`                         | `false`        |
| `type`      | `type`      | The value type of the toggle button group.    | `"basic" \| "divided" \| "light"` | `'basic'`      |
| `value`     | `value`     | The value of the selected toggle button.      | `any`                             | `undefined`    |


## Events

| Event       | Description                              | Type               |
| ----------- | ---------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `tk-change` | Emitted when the selected value changes. | `CustomEvent<any>` |
